hero.name: {{name}}
hero.description: I develop complete web applications, working both on the front-end with HTML, CSS, JS, and React, and on the back-end with Python and Django.

desktop.text_1: I am currently in the 4th and final year of the <highlight>High School Technical Degree in Internet Informatics at IFRN - Natal Central.</highlight> Throughout the course, I have been developing my skills and improving my knowledge. Today, I have experience in web development, working on both the <highlight>front-end</highlight> and <highlight>back-end</highlight>. In the 3rd year, I learned about <highlight>Databases</highlight> and in the 4th year we have a complete project to be done with <highlight>React and Typescript</highlight>, which I am sure will further enhance my knowledge in this widely used framework nowadays.
desktop.text_2: My first contact with the job market was as a <highlight>scholarship holder at the <link1>Centro de Soluções Aplicadas (CSA)</link1>,</highlight> where I learned to use <highlight>WordPress</highlight>. I am currently an <highlight>intern in front-end development at <link2>Maxmeio</link2></highlight>, where I mainly use <highlight>Tailwind and Bootstrap</highlight> on a daily basis.

mobile.text_1: I am in the 4th year of the <highlight>High School Technical Degree in Internet Informatics at IFRN - Natal Central.</highlight> I have experience in web development, working on both the <highlight>front-end</highlight> and <highlight>back-end</highlight>. In the 3rd year, I learned about <highlight>Databases</highlight> and in the 4th year we are developing a complete project with <highlight>React and TypeScript</highlight>, which will further enhance my knowledge in this widely used framework.
mobile.text_2: My first contact with the job market was as a <highlight>scholarship holder at the <link1>Centro de Soluções Aplicadas (CSA)</link1>,</highlight> where I worked using <highlight>WordPress</highlight>. I am currently an <highlight>intern in front-end development at <link2>Maxmeio</link2></highlight>, where I mainly use <highlight>Tailwind and Bootstrap</highlight> on a daily basis.
